SearchDistance.description: How far this object can move when searching for a player to attack.

SearchMoveSpeed.description: How fast this object can move while searching for a player to attack.

ViewBoxHalfLengthX.description: The width of the area this object uses to search for players to attack.

ViewBoxHalfLengthY.description: The height of the area this object uses to search for players to attack.

ViewBoxHalfLengthZ.description: The depth of the area this object uses to search for players to attack.

ViewBoxOffset.description: How far away this object's view box is from its current position.

AttackConst.description: Whether this enemy will attack the player constantly?

StraightDistance.description: How long this enemy charges straight ahead before properly chasing after the player?

RespawnTime.description: How long before this object respawns.

RespawnOffsetPos.description: The offset that should be applied to this enemy's position when first respawned, before it flies back to its normal position?

RespawnPathUID.description: The UID of the path this enemy should follow upon respawning, if any.

In3D.description: Whether this object is in a 3D section, or a 2D section.

IsEscape.description: Whether this enemy tries to escape from the player?

IsEventDriven.description: Whether this object is active by default or must be triggered by something first.
